title: December
description: What if you are  - single - with low esteem - with a low wage job in spite of having a degree - with an unwanted guest who is threatening your life?  Nicole has managed to survive the first three obstacles. But the fourth is too much even for an easy-going person like her. Now she's faced with a tough decision. Will she be able to take a stand or will her fears and self-doubts prevail as usual?
author: Dani Corlee
